It was so huge that it took up the whole shelf and still only barley fitting in.You knew Mewtwo would like this, he always came across as a sweet tooth.

Mewtwo wagged his tail like a puppy as you brought the cake over to the table. You set it down in front of him, his mouth practically watering at the sight. You prepare to cut the cake before Mewtwo grabs it with his paws and started to shovel it into his mouth. Chocolate icing smeared on his cheeks as he munched away. You couldn't help but think it was kinda cute how he ate.

Soon, Mewtwo managed to eat the entire cake, not leaving a single crumb on the plate. He licks the last bits of icing off his cheeks and leans back in his chair, exposing his now food filled belly. 1513.content:
“Oh come on now, don't be silly! You're not weird at all, human.” Mewtwo reassures you in a polite gesture, floating around you once more. You couldn't tell where he was some of the time, because one moment you could see him but the next you'd be staring into the background of stars.

“Well- well I mean- I don't know, I mean, er-...” you're becoming quite flustered. He giggles as you cover your head in your hands, face red as a beet as your mind is drowning in perverse situations you could be having. Mewtwo backs off in front of you, only to give a face of understanding.

For a moment you thought you saw a hint of disappointment...

“Oh alright then, what do you want to talk about?” Mewtwo asks in a playful manner, recovering. You summon the courage to ask Mewtwo your first question.

“Where are we?” You ask him. You're able to lose some of the red that had formulated in your face as his demeanor changed. Mewtwo put his paw against his chin as he answered.

“Well… it's an illusion,” Mewtwo starts, you stare as he continues, “but maybe it could be a picture of space itself? I mean, I'm strong but to think of everything moving like this?” You follow Mewtwo’s gaze out to the open galaxy.

Starstruck, but before Mewtwo could get back on topic, you pull out another question. “So why did you decide to meet me?”

Mewtwo quickly broke his stare and looked directly at you. His mouth couldn't find the words as fast as his brain, and he ended up stuttering and blurting out why at the same time.

“You- you, uh- so- well, like I said, I saw the way I ad- you admired me, so I brought you here,” Mewtwo immediately straightened up his back and continued, keeping his composure better than you did, “the way you train your Pokémon, and how decisive your battles were, you're a person of a quality much better than a trainer or- really anyone.”

You had thought that you had exposed Mewtwo, if he had any personal reasons, but what he said took you aback. You? Exceptional? Decisive? Your spirits rose slightly and your blush came back.

Mewtwo drifted closer to you, his paws on your shoulders as he whispers in your ear, you tilt your head in a gentle sway to capture his words, his breath, “I also saw how lonely you were… not too many humans go so unnoticed at your age…” you felt hit with a pang of unexpected melancholy, your face draining of color as you dwelled on the subject, “and I didn't think that was fair for you… so here you are.”

The two of you float in silence for a moment. Mewtwo then places himself in front of you and wraps his arms slowly around your shoulders… “And… well… you know me… angry… unnatural. We're a lot alike you know?”

“Yeah… you're right.” You admit to him, gently placing your arms around his back in a hug. His purple skin felt a lot like his belly, but with less flesh, just kinda squishy but not like his stomach. Admit it, his body felt nice, the curves, the beautiful color, his tail… you liked it.

A gleam in Mewtwo’s eyes made them widen as the embrace of you hugging him back wasn't expected. His mouth was agape, about to speak.

“You… you are special, aren't you.” Mewtwo whispered longingly. You were slightly confused once more as he placed his hands on your hips and lightly adjusted you to be floating in front of him.

“I… I don't know… you keep saying that but really, I don't know what you mean…”

“You didn't immediately… well, embrace your desires, you weren't… pushy for some action. Unlike others-” Mewtwo spat under his breath as he said the last two words, a twinge of momentary nervousness felt, “You just- wanted to talk. Everyone thus far I've brought here… only to be met with hidden perverts and two-faced humans. I've never taken a Pokémon in here… unless I was hungry but- only humans, because they were intelligent. I once thought to retract that thought after some had… some had some awfully weird requests. But, it's also my mistake, I bring too many here when I myself feel lone- I mean- I- I feel, pent up I'd say, and go about it the wrong way.”

You were amazed, and in pity for Mewtwo, because from what you could hear it sounded like he had been lonely. You reach out to grasp his hand and succeed in him drifting in front of you. His face in front of yours, his hands folded between yours, his hips parallel to your own, and a heat. You goad him to continue, “I know how that feels, people I've met tend to be pushy too, just, not in a sexual way… these days it feels like everyone's so spiteful and just out to get you.”

Mewtwo shot a look at you, one that catches you off guard, a look of sudden fear and shock. “Who? Who's out to get me?!” Mewtwo’s eyes widen and his grip to your hands tightens harshly. The power of his foreign paws, the nubs they were, held such that you let out a yelp of pain. Mewtwo instantly realized his mistake and jerked his paws away from your hands. His face turned red and he gasped, much to the irony of his grand posture. “Sorry- I'm sorry- I just-”

Before you let him finish you reach forward to hold his paws again, “No, no, it's fine. I remember, the lab-” Mewtwo’s eyes flickered with attention, he attempts to hold back his past fears, “you're alright, Mewtwo.”

Mewtwo pulled and sprung his arms around your body again, in a hug, but this time you knew there was more to it, and he had squeezed, his head just resting on your shoulder. You patted him on the back to assure him. “Thank you…” he whispered weakly.

Hoping to lead him into a lighter topic, you ask another question. “So…” you start, but he doesn't move much, “I had thought this question earlier, but what do you eat?” You whisper into his ear.

“Oh, the usual I guess,” Mewtwo sighed, you tilt your head until he realizes that he was being asked what do you eat and not what do you want, “Oh- well… Pokémon for the most part. Berries sometimes,” he pressed his face still into your shoulder, “and when I said weird requests earlier, I meant really weird, some people just sacrifice themselves to me. They do it in different ways too…”

You blushed as you realized that he really did mean they were perverted people he had brought here, only to know you're a little bit like that as well. The heat before rose to an uncomfortable shift between Mewtwo’s body being pressed against yours and the fact both of you wanted some attention.
